website_summaries.verdict: For what it costs, the OCZ Trion 100 series solid-state drive and ideal replacement drive for an older computer that still runs on a regular hard drive.
pros: The OCZ Trion 100 series solid-state drive is much faster than any regular hard drive and is affordable
The SSD also has high endurance, allowing you to write a lot of data to it before it becomes unreliable
cons: Compared with other solid-state drives (not traditional hard drives) on the market the new Trion is among the slowest
The drive also comes with a short three-year warranty and doesn't support encryption

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. A huge waste of time
customer_reviews.text: This OCZ SSD performs very fast when it is working. However, reliability is a HUGE problem. I have ordered about 20 of them for a project. 3 of them failed after less than 10 hours. 1 failed today, less than 15 days after installation. Have to go to job site to replace ALL of them out with SSD from another vendor. I am not sure how OCZ can let such a failure rate pass their QC. Very disappointed. A huge waste of time. Amazon is always super. Request refund without any issue. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: IT Pro

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Drive worked flawlessly for 2 months straight. Attempting to boot up one evening the drive is no longer detected. After adjusting as many settings as possible/available concluded the drive is dead. Amazon promptly processed a refund and I purchased a higher end SSD from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to update the firmware be sure to keep a backup solution
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a mac and then hardly ever used it - I just built a windows 10 to do some training and was using it daily then it died.. probably had less than 1000 hours.. Be sure to update the firmware. I did very much like how easy it was to get it replaced and they replaced it with a trion - which is not light like this one but its for a desktop anyway. I would buy from Toshiba ocz again if I saw a good deal - if I am buying on purpose I would get an ADATA
customer_reviews.author: Ted Sbardella

customer_reviews.title: ( Read - 450mb/s. and Write - 160mb/s. )
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my HP 15" notebook with Sata 3.0 , 6gb. connection. Benchmark scores are terrible. ( Read - 500mb/s. and Write - 160mb/s. ) The OCZ Arc 100 had better benchmark scores. The Best Value Deal is to buy the "Samsung Evo 850 SSD" These work great and have a read and write of about 500mb/s. I have had good success with the Samsung Evo 850 SSD's in Laptops, Notebooks, Windows PC's and Macs. Samsung Evo 850 SSD = ( Read - 520mb/s. and Write - 520mb/s. )
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Workable with no Performance
customer_reviews.text: OCZ needs to utilize a better interface program and incorporate a program that helps to optimize the SSD. It works, it runs and it does the job, but I also have a Samsung 840 EVO and the SSD has 25% better performance than the OCZ SSD does. Samsung might cost a little more, but I am sure I won't be buying a OCZ again, even though it is supposed to be perfectly mated to my current motherboard, which is a ASUS F2A85-V PRO. Bottom line is that it has a great price, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Claw

customer_reviews.title: Failed within a Year, RMA process was easy and great, don't forget to backup your files.
customer_reviews.text: Died on me in less than a year. However, the RMA process was very easy and they even upgraded the SSD ( OCZ VECTOR 180) for me to use. So far this is the only SSD that failed and Hopefully the new SSD will be good to go since my other OCZ SSD (Trion 150) works well. If you haven't already , ensure you have backups of your important files from your computer so in the event a Hard drives fails that you won't lose everything.
customer_reviews.author: Diaz

customer_reviews.title: FYI this will work with an xbox one, I ...
customer_reviews.text: FYI this will work with an xbox one, I put it in. Also you need to format it first in windows/linux, if you just plug it in xbox will not see it (caused me some aggravation), I used exfat then plugged it in and it fired right up on my console. Helps a lot with load times on fallout 4.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best SSD when looking at price per GB
customer_reviews.text: I just completed my first PC build. By gaming standards I built a budget system. By my personal standards, compared to the pre-built systems I have purchased in years past, this is a monster system. I love it! Looking at performance specs of SSD drives, this one is quite a bit slower. However, when you factor in price per GB, this drive is the no contest winner! I would absolutely purchase this SSD again! Easy to install. Easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not the fastest SSD out there but it takes a bulk of the work off of my aging 2TB hard drive and makes programs like Vegas and G
customer_reviews.text: Cheap black Friday pricing and just enough storage for a boot device for my PC. Not the fastest SSD out there but it takes a bulk of the work off of my aging 2TB hard drive and makes programs like Vegas and Gimp load in seconds. Wouldn't necessarily recommend for laptops because of the low storage space, but as a boot drive it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great SSD for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these to install my OS on two new builds for my brother and myself. They have been flawless and have exceeded my expectations. They kick on very well. SSD over disc based is no comparison. My PC boots extremely fast compared to non SSD computers I have used in the past. For information we installed two Windows 10 Pro keys.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Looking at the review now it looks like ...
customer_reviews.text: Died in 6 months. Very disappointed. Looking at the review now it looks like they were rated good at first then all the reviews went down hill about the time these were discontinued. I will only ever buy samsung ssd's now. Pain to have a drive die. The laptop just shutdown in the middle of typing a word document.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer S.Top Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: A good reliable drive.
customer_reviews.text: Its been running in my system for about three months now and not a single hitch the speeds are nice and do not expect anything to go wrong. I have bought several OCZ products and never had a issue. I would buy another when I upgrade my system again.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Lester

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Died almost immediately with less than 20GB in writes total.
customer_reviews.text: Installed Windows 10 on it for a NUC, booted it up, and after 4 hours of up-time it died. Neither Windows or Linux could even see it when connected via SATA. Replaced with a Crucial drive, it's been up and running with zero downtime for 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: BePositive

customer_reviews.title: so far so good, I had problems running the drive from a ...
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, I had problems running the drive from a clone, but when I installed a fresh install of windows 10 it now seems to run great! I will keep you posted... It is VERY fast , I am only using it in SATA 2 (Mother board limit) mode and it made my start up go from 4 minutes to 45 secs!!!
customer_reviews.author: DD Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Was Working AMAZING, the Gave Out, No service Response..Pissed
customer_reviews.text: The hard drive gave out on me in three months, it was a complete waste of money and a loss of many many memories any form of files and data. 0CZ would do right by replacing at least My SSD drive, Or possibly a better model with new technology because mine broke quickly I think that is only fair. When will you respond and help me I had reached out multiple ways I'm finally leaving a review. I could not get a callback from your office or the numbers I find so hopefully you get this message it's a damn shame because you have such great technology they just gave out on me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Good Drive, Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Drive got here earlier than promised, that's why we like Prime, otherwise we would cancel membership. Went with this item because the company stands behind their products so far as we have dealt with them. It runs very fast, boots laptop in 11 seconds to windows 7, and is really easy to install, no fancy software if doing a clean install. Migrating your present drive to this would require 3rd party software which is easy to find online and free, depending where you look. I have installed windows 7 and 10 three times each choosing different builds to test and drive still shows no lag. I would buy another when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Wenger

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive SDD that turns a cheap laptop into a contender
customer_reviews.text: Goals: An inexpensive SDD to replace the slow 1TB HDD that came with the laptop (Check). Improve perceptible performance (Check). Reduce heat (Check). Reduce Weight (Check). Reduce risk of shock (Check). There are faster SDD available, but at higher prices. Based on your own goals you may need to substitute, just way all the factors.
customer_reviews.author: dj sj

customer_reviews.title: Performs as spec'd! Excellent performance for the money, and going strong after many months of use.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent performance! Was kind of surprised at how fast Windows 10 loaded up with this drive compared to the spinning drive before - a 7200rpm 1TB drive. For the price, it's great! I believe I could eek out a bit more performance with the higher-end models, but for general use as a system drive, this is great!
customer_reviews.author: L. Seltzer

customer_reviews.title: Quick to Die, But They Were Quick to Replace it
customer_reviews.text: Died after about a month of use. Hopefully it's eligible for a return. I've only built a few computers but this is the first piece of hardware I've ever had that died so quickly. Edit: I felt the need to make this edit to say that their customer support was really top notch. They responded to my email in 20 min and had the new part en route in less than 24 hours from my first email. I think they just realize that they have a less than stellar product out there, though, so they're used to doing this.
customer_reviews.author: Blane Goulding

customer_reviews.title: Died after only a couple months and the manufacturer would ...
customer_reviews.text: Died after only a couple months and the manufacturer would not honor their warrantee. I will never purchase another OCZ product. Luckily I had purchased an Assurant 360 Protection Plan and they came to the rescue.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Banks

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good SSD for the price(on sale)
customer_reviews.text: Works just as advertised, came quick and nicely packaged. Everything installed correctly and is running as I had expected it to! Fast boot up, and it plays games faster than my HDD, which is nice! Means I can load up the games I enjoy playing quicker and without having to play the waiting game. Would Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: it was fine and matched the specs OCZ provided but it shouldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in Sep 2015, it's now May 2016 and the drive just failed on me. When it was working, it was fine and matched the specs OCZ provided but it shouldn't have failed in 8 months. It was in a computer that was on most of the time but usually idle. I've submitted for an RMA but it's a weekend so their customer support is closed but I'll update with anything useful that comes from them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Smith

customer_reviews.title: The drive was only good until it died in 4 months yesterday
customer_reviews.text: The drive was only good until it died in 4 months yesterday. I made a mistake of looking for inexpensive and I got horrible reliability. Spend more for top reliability, this is the most crucial and time consuming piece in a PC to have to replace (data/time). I am extremely disappointed. I am assuming is under warranty but looking at other reviews what is the point of deploying a like replacement. I happily will pay more for reliability, twice as much if needed. No moving part and this thing is dead, crazy to me. I have it on a huge triple fan custom case with very low heat. This is first review on Amazon, I felt compelled. Mario
customer_reviews.author: Mario H. Orozco

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this device
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm very happy with this device. I was able to leverage SSD technology to breath life back into an aging HP Elitebook. Read and write rates are fantastic for average use. Durability is outstanding. I expect to keep this drive for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great Drive Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using mine for just over two years and it has been working perfectly. No issues at all and updates happen seamlessly. Update: I been using mine every day for 4 years now and it is still working flawlessly. Love Love Love this SSD.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of less then normal use, it died! I only used it for my operating system. What a shame. I would like to contac OCZ as I own 3 of there ssd drives ! I would hope they could provide with a replacement of somekind......... update will follow!
customer_reviews.author: NCC1701E

customer_reviews.title: Budget ssd
customer_reviews.text: Need at least 20g buffer space or it become very slow.., like 180mb/s slow......
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Decent drive, Good customer support.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast drive, but it failed in abut 3 months. I called OCZ directly and they worked with me to resolve the issue in a satisfactory manor. It turns out that early models of this drive had a firmware issue, but it has been rectified in newer models.
customer_reviews.author: Eric_B_1984

customer_reviews.title: Very much worth the money, surprisingly good performance
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid for this drive I am extremely pleased and surprised. I paired it with another 960GB from Crucial and I actually notice how fast this OCZ card is. That's tough with SSD's. I just bought another one for a new build without blinking. Just hope they can keep the prices down!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Died after a year
customer_reviews.text: After a year of light use, started to get very slow and eventually died.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: 3 years later.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this SSD around August 2015. It just died. So it lasted me around 3 years, which isn't bad. However, the disappointing part is that it didn't even show any warning signs, so some of my documents were exactly backed up, and now they're lost. Good run though.
customer_reviews.author: Abrar

customer_reviews.title: NICE and FAST
customer_reviews.text: Combined with Linux Lite (or LXLE) makes for really FAST laptops, with an "old" dual core Intel Core Duo with only 2.0Ghz and even on a newer 1.4Ghz(!!!) ASUS laptop. The Asus should IMHO never have been sold with Windows; what a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Eike J. Heinze

customer_reviews.title: Great drive; and OCZ support is tops!
customer_reviews.text: The drive performs beautifully; no problems a few months in. I have nothing but good to say about OCZ; I had a drive that turned out to be defective, and they sent out an advanced replacement that came in almost immediately. This was a perfect HDD upgrade for my Lenovo T410. It is working great, and I am now running Windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: Marc R. Tardiff

customer_reviews.title: If you HATE someone, GIFT them this drive...
customer_reviews.text: If negative stars were a possibility, I would definitely had given this SSD that rating. This was laptop's my main SSD and it randomly DIED just after few months of use and it was not as if it had intense use or anything like that. It only had work files, which were critically important, but did not all took any space. So essentially it died after only a 2 GB usage. NEVER EVER BUY an OCZ drive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one to breathe new life into my 2010 Macbook Pro and the other for a portable hard drive since my Western Digital died. It's a great economical choice for SSD.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hofer

customer_reviews.title: Dead drive after only 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drive in mid September (2015) and it died a few days ago. Not readable by the BIOS in several different laptops or an external USB enclosure. Having a drive fail after only 4 months is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: bdn

customer_reviews.title: Great Drive
customer_reviews.text: Using this to install some of my steam games on, so far no problems, I will update if there is anything newsworthy, but for the price, great drive, if you can afford it buy one with more storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Great for boot drive
customer_reviews.text: Great drive. I use this as my boot and program drive paired with a green second drive for data. Really improves the speed. Make sure it has the latest firmware before using it as a boot drive.
customer_reviews.author: IwinYouwin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price! ONLY LASTED A YEAR
customer_reviews.text: Working fine for me so far! UPDATE, hard drive no longer works. Tried in several diffferent computers, and nothing will recognize it. The laptop it was in was rarely used and this still did not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Quinn

customer_reviews.title: I would strongly recommend this drive as boot drive for a desktop or ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this drive for about 5 months with no issues, drive is very fast and responsive. Windows boots in about 1/5 of the time of my old hard drive. Mine came with the latest firmware already installed. I would strongly recommend this drive as boot drive for a desktop or as a drive for a laptop if you don't use much storage.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, fast and reliable. Exactly what everyone is looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Aestetically unbeatable. Functions just like it should. Reliable build quality. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Rees

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I'm a computer tech and have relied on amazon for low prices and fast shipping. I bought these cause I was looking for a best bang for the buck. Fits the needs of my customers budget and also providing decent storage. It works just as expected from a SSD Hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: GLOW on Live

customer_reviews.title: It worked great and booted my computer right up after copying my ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked great and booted my computer right up after copying my OS to it. Boot speed has decreased, and launching applications is quick. I'm going to be buying another as I sold the laptop which I installed this in
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the fail rate....
customer_reviews.text: This drive failed after 5 months. This is the third OCZ SSD that has failed prematurely. My Samsung and ADATA drives seems to hold up for years.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Smith

customer_reviews.title: Average Speed SSD. Worth the money though.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as advertised but stopped working within a week. Returned and got a replacement very quick! So far so good. Average speed SSD, but better than a regular spinning platter drive.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond Dominic D'sa

customer_reviews.title: Thank god for backups
customer_reviews.text: Mine was a great performer....Was is the key word. It just died after 2 years of service with no warning. No longer recognized by bios on multiple pc's. Thank god for backups
customer_reviews.author: Lori Mock

customer_reviews.title: It has also not presented me with errors like other SSD drives I have installed
customer_reviews.text: My fastest drive even though it is rated with a lower speed than other SSD drives in my machine. It has also not presented me with errors like other SSD drives I have installed. I am completely satisfied and recommend OCZ SSD drives over much of the competition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best deal for a name brand
customer_reviews.text: Bought this guy for a customer build and at the sale price and specs... best deal for a name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: ... fast and the OCZ software makes firmware updates fairly easy.
customer_reviews.text: This drive is fast and the OCZ software makes firmware updates fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Schiffner

customer_reviews.title: okay if you find it cheap for regular upgrade
customer_reviews.text: it's ok, noisy . normal SSD performance but not great. I update the firmware it's a little better .
customer_reviews.author: ALEN

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Dropped this drive into an old PC and wow, just wow, this sucker boots from cold to Windows 10 desktop in ~15s.
customer_reviews.author: Robbienz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great for the money. was on sale because it was an obsolete item.
customer_reviews.author: marine spook

customer_reviews.title: Two drives dead
customer_reviews.text: The first drive lasted about two weeks. The second about 5 months. Both completely died and unable to recognize from Bios or external enclosure. Needless to say I'm very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W.

customer_reviews.title: This drive is a good deal for an alternative drive
customer_reviews.text: This drive is a good deal for an alternative drive, but it isn't very fast. I found that recording footage would lock up whenever using this drive as the recording drive because of speed caps.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great no problems.used it to upgrade an old hp desktop much faster load times

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: no complaints, but somehow I was expecting faster.... maybe is not the disk but the rest of the system
customer_reviews.author: Polin2

customer_reviews.title: Avoid! Hard drive failed after 5 months of it working fine!
customer_reviews.text: Bought and installed this as my boot drive for a computer I was building mid September 2015. 5 months later the SSD is now deader than dead. Won't even show up in the BIOS or in my hard drive dock on another computer. Worthless. What a rip off!!
customer_reviews.author: Kitt Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Computer turns on like a charm as well
customer_reviews.text: Used and have had no problems with it. Computer turns on like a charm as well. Never more than 10 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great SSD for a great price. Not the fastest that you can get, but certainly leaps and bounds better than mechanical drives.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: the best upgrade to my computer I have made
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, the best upgrade to my computer I have made!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JRule

customer_reviews.title: No problems here.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say, it's an SSD. I haven't tested read/write speeds, but my OS boots super fast, which is really all I wanted an SSD for, so it's good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Doyle Moeller

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more... its not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Product failed within 3 months of using. The drive is undetectable and now just an awful paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Great performance
customer_reviews.text: Not my first SSD but this SSD is very fast and very well priced for the capacity I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Speedy and reliable. I use this as a second boot drive for my games. Definitely notice the speed difference.
customer_reviews.author: daniel smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in my laptop and it was like night and day. Runs incredibly fast!
customer_reviews.author: TimeForWaffles

customer_reviews.title: Incompatible with older Macs
customer_reviews.text: Apparently not compatible with older Macs. Tried to install it on a MacBook Pro 17" Late 2011. No success. Very disappointed. Will be returning this drive and unfortunately I might not consider OCZ ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo Ag

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded Mac Mini to this and getting 6-9 seconds boot times AWESOME!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Dead in less than 2 months, unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it August 23, dead October 12. Not reliable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price and works as described. Delivered on time
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad B

customer_reviews.title: Died after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: worked fine as my secondary HD then died today. So that really sucks. Seems many other people have this issue after about 2 years of use so i would avoid
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin W.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bang for the buck! I have two and they both are rock solid!
customer_reviews.author: Luke @HuzzahGamers

customer_reviews.title: Picked this gem up on sale and glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Picked this gem up on sale and glad I did. This gave my laptop a noticeable boost of speed and boot up and in the day to day grind

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded an older laptop and can't even believe how fast it boots up now!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works without any problem for more than one year already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good drive for the price. Not as fast as a Samsung.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its as good as you can get for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Night Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good drive for my environment. I'm using it as a boot drive for my home server. It's much faster than the WDC Black Hdd I was previously booting from.
customer_reviews.author: cwmjr

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It lasted about a year before it stopped working (wasn't being detected). Considering I got it on sale (~$35), I'm not too bummed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and pretty simple to install, really enjoying the huge amounts of gb's :) good stuff

customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work out of the box with Mac hardware, may need to install trim enablers and such to work seamlessly with mac hardware.

customer_reviews.title: Quit almost instantly
customer_reviews.text: It quit less than a month, with no warning. They claim its under a 3 year warranty/protection; that was a lie.

customer_reviews.title: Worked brilliantly for me
customer_reviews.text: Worked brilliantly for me. I used it to upgrade my PS4 prior to installing Rock Band (and all its DLC). It was a simple install, and the drive works great.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: OCZ hasnt let me down yet, used in 15+ builds.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas A. Compton

customer_reviews.title: Best to avoid this SSD
customer_reviews.text: A really terrible product. Like many others, mine died after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mysterio

customer_reviews.title: Great price, woks good for the money a good ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price, woks good for the money a good deal. as with any piece of electronics, time is the story teller. if this continues to work in a year as it does to day, then it is even a better deal!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Quickest way to upgrade your computer!
customer_reviews.text: makes the computer AT LEAST 10 times faster! Best way to up the performance of your computer quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Banks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, fast Solid State drive. What more do you need?

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Can now view HD files without it ...
customer_reviews.text: What a difference from standard hard drive to SSD. Great value. Can now view HD files without it stammering. Loads so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: And that would mean what to me?

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise great.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly does not come with SATA cable or mounting screws. Otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Rev Jake

customer_reviews.title: Also the OCZ tool (OCZ Guru) does not recognize it when plugged in with a USB cable - how stupid is that
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It is not the fastest drive and it definitely does not work with older MacBooks ('09 - '11). Also the OCZ tool (OCZ Guru) does not recognize it when plugged in with a USB cable - how stupid is that?!?!? I bought 10 for my repair business, but these are just too much of hassle to use. Spend $5 more and get Kingston or Sandisk
customer_reviews.author: Tsvetan Georgiev

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No problem duplicating regular drive to this ssd. works very, very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Moroz

customer_reviews.title: Very slow
customer_reviews.text: Awful speed. I bought it with hope to increase the speed of my old laptop. Installed fresh Win 10 and it boots for 3-5 minutes with 100% I/O load. Probably this drive doesn't work well for random file reading. Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product, died in 5 weeks, not eligible for return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It is quite fast. The only problem I had with it was that it died within three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: cheap and fast
customer_reviews.text: I use this for DIY NAS home server.. pretty fast and reliable
customer_reviews.author: Aly.

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Simple
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace the second hard drive in my laptop. It worked perfectly. I just plugged it in, worked a little with the BIOS to recognize the drive, copied my data back to it, and it just flies now. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: tom hammack

customer_reviews.title: Still working. I run my OS on it no ...
customer_reviews.text: Still working. I run my OS on it no trouble yet.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Wild

customer_reviews.title: It died after 2 months of use. Lost a ...
customer_reviews.text: It died after 2 months of use. Lost a lot of really important files I needed for work, very unhappy. Would not recommend if you are looking at SSD'S.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: SSD died within a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Drive died within two-three months. Complete failure. BIOS won't see it, SSD guru won't see it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and died with zero notice at the 8 month mark. thankobama.jpg
customer_reviews.author: Ron Schunck

product_meta.title: OCZ Storage Solutions Trion 100 Series 480GB SATA III 2.5" Solid State Drive TRN100-25SAT3-480G
product_meta.description: Capacity:480 GBThe most awarded SSD brand of all time brings you the all-new OCZ Trion 100 Series. Designed to optimize your notebook or PC easily and affordably, the trailblazing Trion 100 Series SSD leverage premium Toshiba TLC NAND flash to go the distance and deliver a superior balance of performance, reliability, and value that will transform any mobile or desktop system. Max Read 550 MB/s, Max Write 530 MB/s, Max Random Read (4K QD32) 90,000 IOPS. Endurance for daily usage guidelines is 110 GB/day. 3 year of Shield Plus warranty with Toll-Free Tech Support, 24 Hour Forum Support & Firmware updates. Fast & Efficient Up your productivity with the Trion 100 Series and enjoy faster boot ups, file transfers, and system responsiveness. Say goodbye to hard drive lag and get a state-of-the-art computing experience worthy of your time. Performance Made Affordable Upgrading to an SSD can feel like you've purchased an entirely new system- not only because of the enhanced speed, but also the initial investment normally associated with the technology. Trion 100 SSDs balance price and performance so you have enough funds leftover for other upgrades. World-class Quality and Reliability With 100% Toshiba technology built into every drive, each Trion 100 SSD is engineered for superior quality and reliability, keeping your data secure. Better Battery Life The more power-efficient Trion 100 Series is optimized for lower energy consumption which translates into longer battery life to keep you up and running longer. Serious Speed. Zero Tricks. Trion 100 offers plenty of real world performance for all your gaming and productivity applications. No fancy behind-the-scenes tricks, just pure storage performance.
feature_bullets: Next generation Toshiba A19 TLC NAND Flash & Toshiba Controller Technology
Sleek housing offers slimmer 7mm z-height for compatibility with the ultra-thin notebooks

3 Year OCZ Shield Plus Warranty- an elite worry-free customer service experience that eliminates the hassle surrounding traditional support and warranty claims, with exclusive features including free return shipping and advanced replacement
Interface: SATA 6Gb/s (Compatible with SATA 3Gb/s and SATA 1.5Gb/s)
Max sequential Read speed: 550MB/s; Max sequential Write speed: 530 MB/s; Max Random Read: 90,000 IOPS; Max Random Write: 54,000 IOPS
Endurance: TBW (Total Bytes Written) 120 TB; Daily Usage Guidelines of 110 GB/day
